mapper.insert: INSERT INTO common_collection ( user_id, collect_type, collect_object_id, collect_url, collect_time ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{collect_type}, #{collect_object_id}, #{collect_url}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cat_code, b.cat_name, a.publish_date FROM info_basic a LEFT JOIN info_category b ON a.cat_code = b.cat_code WHERE a.id IN (SELECT collect_object_id FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type=1 AND user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY a.publish_date DESC

SELECT id, goods_name, img_url, specification, price, price_unit, produce_area, inventory, inventory_unit, public_time FROM mall_supply WHERE id IN (SELECT collect_object_id FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type=3 AND user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY public_time DESC

SELECT a.*, COUNT(a.id) AS askBuy FROM mall_purchase a LEFT JOIN mall_offer b ON a.id = b.purchase_id WHERE a.id IN (SELECT collect_object_id FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type = 9 AND user_id = #{user_id}) GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY publish_time DESC

SELECT id, title, video_url, lecturer_name, duration, img_url, STATUS, publish_time FROM train_video_course WHERE id IN (SELECT collect_object_id FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type=5 AND user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY publish_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.title, b.cat_name, a.content, a.img_url, a.read_count, a.publish_date FROM info_basic a LEFT JOIN info_category b ON a.cat_code = b.cat_code WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, video_type, lecturer_name, publish_time, course_introduce, duration, video_url, img_url, status FROM train_video_course WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT count(1) FROM common_collection c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id,5 AS type FROM train_video_course UNION SELECT id,2 AS type FROM spec_article UNION SELECT id,3 AS type FROM mall_supply UNION SELECT id,9 AS type FROM mall_purchase UNION SELECT id,1 AS type FROM info_basic) a ON c.collect_type = a.type AND c.collect_object_id = a.id WHERE c.collect_type = #{collect_type} AND c.collect_object_id = #{collect_object_id} AND c.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type = #{collect_type} AND collect_object_id = #{collect_object_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM common_collection WHERE collect_type=#{collect_type} AND collect_object_id=#{collect_object_id}
